backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Prepare a brief for my upcoming meeting with customer Beta and include a dossier for each customer attendee and the topics they are most interested in. Include a background on their company.

gutts.name: Identify Upcoming Meeting with Customer Beta
gutts.capability: Locate the specific upcoming calendar event involving customer Beta
gutts.user_goal: Find the correct meeting to prepare for
gutts.evidence: Query calendar events and match 'customer Beta' in participant or title fields

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Details
gutts.capability: Retrieve date, time, and participant list from the identified meeting
gutts.user_goal: Obtain meeting metadata for context and attendee identification
gutts.evidence: Parse event object for start time, end time, and attendees

gutts.name: Identify Customer Attendees
gutts.capability: Filter attendees belonging to customer Beta from the participant list
gutts.user_goal: Determine which attendees represent the customer
gutts.evidence: Cross-reference attendee emails/domains with Beta's domain

gutts.name: Retrieve Profile Data for Each Customer Attendee
gutts.capability: Fetch professional background and role information for each identified attendee
gutts.user_goal: Gather attendee-specific details for the dossier
gutts.evidence: Call CRM or LinkedIn API to get role, title, and bio

gutts.name: Determine Topics of Interest for Each Attendee
gutts.capability: Analyze historical interactions or preference data to identify topics each attendee cares about
gutts.user_goal: Personalize the briefing by including relevant topics
gutts.evidence: Aggregate prior meeting notes or CRM tags to extract interest areas

gutts.name: Compile Dossier for Each Customer Attendee
gutts.capability: Generate a structured summary containing attendee background and topics of interest
gutts.user_goal: Create an attendee-specific dossier for the briefing
gutts.evidence: Assemble profile details and interest topics into a formatted section

gutts.name: Retrieve Company Background for Customer Beta
gutts.capability: Gather company-level information such as industry, size, recent news
gutts.user_goal: Provide context about the customer's organization
gutts.evidence: Query company database or external sources for Beta's profile

gutts.name: Compose Meeting Brief
gutts.capability: Integrate meeting details, attendee dossiers, and company background into a concise briefing document
gutts.user_goal: Deliver a complete, well-structured meeting preparation brief
gutts.evidence: Generate final document with sections for meeting info, attendee dossiers, and company overview
